errors.modelRequired: Please fill in at least one field for the {model} model
errors.loadingExamples: Loading example data... Please try again in a moment.
errors.noExamplesAvailable: No examples available for the {type} feedback type.
errors.noExamplesForStyle: No examples available for the {style} communication style with {type} feedback.
errors.noCompleteExamples: No complete examples available for the {model} model.
errors.noExampleType: No example available for this type.

tooltips.previewNote: This is a preview. You can edit the text above or adjust the form and preview again.

placeholders.preview: Your feedback preview will appear here as you fill in the form fields...

modals.completeExampleDescription: This is a complete example of the {model} feedback model.

simple.name: Simple Feedback
simple.description: Strengths, areas for improvement, and support

sbi.name: Situation-Behavior-Impact (SBI)
sbi.description: A structured approach describing context, behavior, and consequences

star.name: Situation-Task-Action-Result (STAR)
star.description: Comprehensive framework for analyzing specific examples

recognition.name: Recognition
recognition.helpText: Focus on specific achievements and their positive impact

improvement.name: Improvement
improvement.helpText: Address areas for development with a growth mindset

coaching.name: Coaching
coaching.helpText: Guide development toward specific goals with clear examples

separate-identity.name: Separate performance from identity
separate-identity.description: Focus on behaviors rather than personality traits

learning-opportunity.name: Frame as learning opportunity
learning-opportunity.description: Present feedback as a chance to grow and develop

collaborative.name: Use collaborative approach
collaborative.description: Position feedback as a shared journey

future-focused.name: Focus on future improvement
future-focused.description: Emphasize forward movement rather than past mistakes

written.name: Written
written.statement: I'm sharing this feedback in writing to give you time to reflect, but I'm happy to discuss it further when you're ready.

remote.name: Remote
remote.statement: Although we're connecting remotely, I want to ensure this feedback is as clear and supportive as if we were meeting in person.

crisis.name: Crisis/High Pressure
crisis.statement: I recognise we're in a challenging situation right now, but I wanted to take a moment to share some important feedback.

change.name: Organisational Change
change.statement: Despite the changes we're experiencing as an organisation, I wanted to provide some feedback that I believe will be valuable for your continued development.

D.recognition: I want to highlight some impressive results you've achieved recently.
D.improvement: I want to share some direct feedback about where I see opportunities for even better results.
D.coaching: Let's discuss how to optimise your approach for maximum impact.

I.recognition: I'm excited to share some thoughts about the positive impact you've been making!
I.improvement: I'd like to discuss some ideas about how we might collaborate to enhance certain aspects of your work.
I.coaching: I'm looking forward to exploring some development opportunities with you that could be really energising.

S.recognition: I appreciate your consistent contributions and wanted to acknowledge the positive difference you've been making.
S.improvement: I'd like to share some thoughts on how we might build upon your solid foundation to enhance certain areas.
S.coaching: I'd like to offer some supportive guidance on developing certain skills that will help you continue your steady progress.

C.recognition: Based on my analysis of your recent work, I've identified several noteworthy accomplishments to discuss.
C.improvement: After reviewing your work in detail, I've prepared some specific feedback on areas that could benefit from refinement.
C.coaching: I've analysed your current approach and identified some precise adjustments that could optimise your effectiveness.

openingStatements.default: I appreciate you taking the time to discuss this feedback.

closingStatements.D: What specific steps will you take next, and when can we review progress?
closingStatements.I: I'm excited to see how you'll implement these ideas! Let's schedule a follow-up to discuss your creative approach.
closingStatements.S: I'm here to support you through this process. What resources would be most helpful for you?
closingStatements.C: Please let me know if you'd like more data or examples to help you analyse this feedback. I'm happy to provide additional detail.
closingStatements.recognitionD: What other goals are you now setting your sights on?
closingStatements.recognitionI: I'd love to hear your thoughts on this achievement and what you're excited about tackling next!
closingStatements.recognitionS: I hope you take a moment to appreciate your consistent contribution here. What would you like to focus on maintaining or developing next?
closingStatements.recognitionC: Your methodical approach clearly contributed to these results. I'd be interested in your analysis of the most effective aspects of your process.
closingStatements.recognitionDefault: Thank you for your excellent work.
closingStatements.default: I welcome your thoughts on this feedback.

recognition.separate-identity: These accomplishments reflect your dedicated approach and commitment to excellence.
recognition.learning-opportunity: Success like this creates a foundation for continued growth and development.
recognition.collaborative: I appreciate how we've been able to work together in this area.
recognition.future-focused: I'm looking forward to seeing how you'll build on these strengths moving forward.

other.separate-identity: I want to emphasize that this feedback is about specific actions and outcomes, not about you as a person.
other.learning-opportunity: I see this as an opportunity for learning and growth.
other.collaborative: I'd like us to work together on addressing these points.
other.future-focused: Let's focus on how we can move forward from here.

simple.improvement: I believe we can work together on {improvement}. This presents an opportunity for growth and development.
